name: Prompter Skills
description: A collection of prompt engineering skills and workflows.

items.name: ai-humanizer
items.description: Refine content to be conversational, friendly, and undetectable as AI.

items.name: api-contract-generator
items.description: Generate OpenAPI/Swagger API contracts from PRDs.

items.name: design-system
items.description: Create a comprehensive design system with tokens, components, and guidelines.

items.name: document-explainer
items.description: Explain complex documents or code in simple, easy-to-understand terms.

items.name: epic-generator
items.description: Generate detailed Epics from high-level product briefs or requirements.

items.name: epic-single
items.description: Generate a single, detailed Epic from a specific requirement.

items.name: erd-generator
items.description: Create Entity Relationship Diagrams (ERD) from data requirements.

items.name: fsd-generator
items.description: Generate a Functional Specification Document (FSD) for a feature.

items.name: prd-agent-generator
items.description: Create a Product Requirements Document (PRD) specifically for AI Agents.

items.name: prd-generator
items.description: Generate a comprehensive Product Requirements Document (PRD) for software features.

items.name: product-brief
items.description: Create a high-level Product Brief to outline project goals and scope.

items.name: qa-test-scenario
items.description: Generate comprehensive QA test scenarios and test cases.

items.name: skill-creator
items.description: Create a new skill for the Prompter system following standard conventions.

items.name: story-generator
items.description: Generate detailed User Stories from Epics or requirements.

items.name: story-single
items.description: Generate a single, detailed User Story with acceptance criteria.

items.name: tdd-generator
items.description: Generate a Test-Driven Development (TDD) plan and corresponding test code.

items.name: tdd-lite-generator
items.description: Generate a lightweight TDD plan for smaller changes or features.

items.name: wireframe-generator
items.description: Create wireframe descriptions or boilerplate code for UI visualization.

items.name: project-kickoff
items.description: Interactive interview to generate Product Brief, Design System, Wireframes, and TDD.

items.name: create-product-brief
items.description: Interactive interview to generate a Product Brief.

items.name: create-design-system
items.description: Interactive interview to generate a Design System.

items.name: create-wireframes
items.description: Interactive interview to generate Wireframes.

items.name: create-tdd
items.description: Interactive interview to generate a Technical Design Document (TDD).
